timeline
    title Evolution of AI Communication
    1990s : IPC Primitives (Infra_IngressController)
    early 2000s : SOA & SOAP (Infra_LoadBalancer)
    mid 2000s : Enterprise Messaging (Infra_EtcdCluster)

    2011 : Kafka & Event Streams
    mid 2010s : Microservices + API Gateways
    late 2010s : gRPC & Service Meshes
    2020s : LLM-driven Agents
    2023+ : A2A Protocols (Infra_WorkerNode)
